Title: toIntervalHour
Description: Returns an interval of n hours of data type IntervalHour.
n — Number of hours. Integer numbers or string representations thereof, and float numbers. (U)Int*/Float*/String.
Examples: WITH    toDate('2024-06-15') AS date,    toIntervalHour(12) AS interval_to_hoursSELECT date + interval_to_hours AS result
